query:
INSERT INTO seasonalRates (siteId, name, startDate, endDate, weekdayRate, weekendRate, weeklyRate, createdAt)
SELECT 
  s.id,
  'June 13-14 30% Increase',
  '2026-06-13',
  '2026-06-14',
  ROUND(CAST(s.pricePerDay AS DECIMAL(10,2)) * 1.30, 2),
  CASE 
    WHEN CAST(s.weekendPricePerDay AS DECIMAL(10,2)) > 0 
    THEN ROUND(CAST(s.weekendPricePerDay AS DECIMAL(10,2)) * 1.30, 2)
    ELSE ROUND(CAST(s.pricePerDay AS DECIMAL(10,2)) * 1.30, 2)
  END,
  ROUND(CAST(s.pricePerWeek AS DECIMAL(10,2)) * 1.30, 2),
  NOW()
FROM sites s
JOIN shopping_centres c ON s.centreId = c.id
WHERE c.name LIKE '%Chullora%';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 21ksxipa4kLneoE.root --database 6yeAhZnHexQXKcGnnUhDLE --execute INSERT INTO seasonalRates (siteId, name, startDate, endDate, weekdayRate, weekendRate, weeklyRate, createdAt)
SELECT 
  s.id,
  'June 13-14 30% Increase',
  '2026-06-13',
  '2026-06-14',
  ROUND(CAST(s.pricePerDay AS DECIMAL(10,2)) * 1.30, 2),
  CASE 
    WHEN CAST(s.weekendPricePerDay AS DECIMAL(10,2)) > 0 
    THEN ROUND(CAST(s.weekendPricePerDay AS DECIMAL(10,2)) * 1.30, 2)
    ELSE ROUND(CAST(s.pricePerDay AS DECIMAL(10,2)) * 1.30, 2)
  END,
  ROUND(CAST(s.pricePerWeek AS DECIMAL(10,2)) * 1.30, 2),
  NOW()
FROM sites s
JOIN shopping_centres c ON s.centreId = c.id
WHERE c.name LIKE '%Chullora%';
